module.name: class_of_activity_structure
module.keywords: module, class, activity, relationship, structure, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record classes of activity and their whole-part, connection and involvement relationships.

li.p: the existence of a class of activity;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_activity application module.

li.p: a mapping between one class of activity and another that indicates the nature of a whole-part relationship between two individual activities;
A mapping between classes of activity is a class that has relationships between individual activities as members.
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_composition_of_activity application module.

li.p: a mapping between one class of activity and another that indicates the nature of a connection relationship between two individual activities;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_connection_of_activity application module.

li.p: a mapping between a class of activity and a class of product, document, organization, or person that indicates the nature of an involvement in an activity.
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_involvement_in_activity application module.
Individual activity is within the scope of the Individual_activity_structure application module.

li.p: membership of a class of activity.
li.note: Membership of a class of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.

uof.name: class_of_activity_structure
uof.description: The class_of_activity_structure UOF provides the ability to record information about classes of activity and their structure.
